bibl.title: Menander and the Monologue.
bibl.seg: Blundell John, Menander and the Monologue. (Hypomnemata. 59.)

C.R. par Alain Blanchard, REG 97 (1984) pp. 333-334. - M. Delaunois, EtCl 49 (1981) p. 76. - S.M. Goldberg, CJ 78 (1983) pp. 173-176 (concerne aussi Andreas G. Katsouris, Tragic Patterns in Menander. Athens, 1975). - V. Jarcho, Gnomon 54 (1982) pp. 332-335. - Fr. Lasserre, AntCl 52 (1983) p. 329. - E.G. Turner, CR N.S., 32 (1982) p. 94.
